name: NCAA College Football 2K2 - Road to the Rose Bowl [SDC]
description:
NCAA College Football 2K2: Road to the Rose Bowl is an American football video game developed by Visual Concepts in association with 2K Sports. It was released in 2001 for only the Sega Dreamcast. The cover athlete is former Purdue standout quarterback Drew Brees.

The game was the first of two college football games developed by Visual Concepts, the second being NCAA College Football 2K3. The game features season mode, hopefully leading up to the Rose Bowl, and Legacy Mode, where you can follow your team for a few years. It also features online play and customizable plays, players, and teams.
